I would like to propose a tentative chat session for
Sunday June 6th

New York 6:00 pm
Los Angeles 3:00 pm
Chicago 5:00 pm
Sao Paulo/Buenos Aires 7:00 pm

I'm keeping my fingers crossed that is doesn't overlap with the 
satellite/cable broadcast of the NHK Taiga Shinsengumi

It's on from 8 to 8:45-8:50 on the East Coast.  I think it's on saturdays in CA.

# # #

"Samurai, farmer, artisan, or trader,
Oldster, youngster, boy or girl
Clever or stupid, poor or elite.
You won't get civilized if you don't eat meat!"

NOTICE  ---Vice Chief Hijikata would like everyone to know that he is NOT  the author of that atrocious poem despite his progressiveness concerning the Shinsengumi dinner menu.

Captain Okita would like to remind everyone that pork products are not to be considered meat. Ever.

Captain Nagakura insists that there is nothing whatsoever wrong with using misshapen vegetables in any stew containing  meat.

Captain Saitou advises one and all that plain hot soba is in fact the best choice for meals. Always.









--
